title: A 'double dip' in the U.S. economy is 'still possible,' says former Fed official

title: Treasury yields, dollar gain after Fed's historic policy shift
text: Longer-dated Treasury yields and the dollar rose in Asia on Friday after the U.S. Federal Reserve shifted its policy framework to place more emphasis on boosting economic growth and less on worries about letting inflation run too high.

title: Hurricane Laura Threatens U.S. Oil Market
text: Aug.27 -- Hurricane Laura raked Louisiana early Thursday, becoming one of the most powerful storms ever to hit the state, leaving in its wake chemical fires, wrecked buildings, flooded roads and what could be more than $15 billion in insured losses.

title: Sentiment Is Shifting In The Markets: Thornton

title: Fed Wants to Avoid Negative Rates, Kroszner Says
text: Former Federal Reserve Governor Randall Kroszner discusses central bank policy and the U.S. economy. Fed Chair Jerome Powell unveiled a new approach to setting U.S. monetary policy, letting inflation and employment run higher in a shift that will likely keep interest rates low for years to come. Kroszner, now a professor of economics at the University of Chicago Booth School of Business, speaks on "Bloomberg Daybreak: Australia."

title: Asian stocks may be choppy despite U.S. Fed inflation shift, COVID outlook

title: Does the U.S. Economy Need More Stimulus?

title: S&P 500 closes at record as investors parse Fed's historic policy shift

title: S&P, Dow close higher on new Fed inflation stance, COVID test hopes
text: The S&P 500 and the Dow advanced on Thursday as investors digested the U.S. Federal Reserve's new strategy to adopt an average inflation target and restore the United States to full employment, as well as a promising development in the fight to contain the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Hurricane Laura Hit The Oil And Gas Industry When It’s Down. But Don’t Expect A Reckoning.

title: The Latest Revision To Q2's Historically Bad GDP Number: What You Need To Know

title: U.S. GDP fell by almost 33% in the second quarter of 2020
text: Weakness was widespread and consumer spending, most investment components, exports and inventories declined as the economy ground to a halt to stop the spread of Covid-19.

title: Vanguard shifting prime money market fund to safer U.S.-backed investments
text: In September, Vanguard will transition its Prime Money Market Fund into a government money market fund and rename it the Vanguard Cash Reserves Federal Money Market Fund. Fee reductions are also coming for investors.

title: White House adviser Kudlow says administration has no view on who purchases TikTok
text: White House adviser Larry Kudlow said on Monday the Trump administration did not have a view on who purchases the social media company TikTok.

title: Gold futures end 1% lower after Fed policy change
text: Gold futures fell Thursday, with some analysts attributing the loss to the lack of surprise in the Federal Reserve’s approval of changes to its monetary policy strategy that looks to lead to an easier monetary policy stance.

title: Bullard Says Fed Will Try to Make Up for Past Inflation Misses
